Reviews.Content: Very Nice and Great Price Great place to stay for the price, Not far from all shops and the beach. The staff were lovely and helpful. The breakfast is included (eggs, bacon, fruit etc. I would definatly go back.
Reviews.Author: aroundtheworld1974

Reviews.Content: Charming and Quiet We spent 5 nights at the Ari Putri and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The entire property is very attractive and beautifully maintained. Rooms are comfortable with very efficient air conditioning and refrigerators for guest use. Shops and restaurants are all around, and the beach is quite close by. The rooms have balconies overlooking the peaceful pool area. We were very pleased with our stay here.
Reviews.Author: BakerB

Reviews.Content: Lovely, great value hotel For around $25 per night I would 100% recommend the Ari Putri for those who wish to stay in Sanur in pleasant, clean, comfortable rooms 5 mins from the beach with friendly staff.
Reviews.Author: travelorg

Reviews.Content: Nice and relaxing at Ari Putri Hotel Sanur I have a lovely stay at Ari Putri Hotel for 2 nights. the room was nice, neat and clean. Great Bathtub, relaxing atmosphere. Nice swiming pool. the sound of swaying trees are just wonderful. Just 5 min walk to the beach. 100% recommended!
Reviews.Author: uniqueisland

Reviews.Content: A fine hotel I booked a room right off the hotel website for $22USD Per night. It was a clean and nice hotel with a clean and nice room. It's not the Ritz Carlton, but it's better than your average hotel.The location is pretty good. You can walk to the beach and around the town.The price includes a breakfast of fruit, eggs, toast, a drink and whatever else they have (sometimes pastries, pancakes or fried rice).The staff was helpful and i would stay here again.
Reviews.Author: fayesuave

Reviews.Content: great location Just got back from Bali,we stayed at Ari Putri for 5 nights.The rooms were basic but nice and clean.Not a lot of staff about, those who were,were very helpful and pleasant. The location was great near to beach shops restaurants, what more do you want for your money. We had an extra person staying so they charged us very little extra and put a single bed in. The breakfast was fine so all in all good base to stay. Would stay there again
Reviews.Author: Jackev

Reviews.Content: Ari Putri Hotel, Bali A small traditional hotel in the centre of Sanur. This is a quiet location with plenty of near by shops and restaurants.The locals seem very desperate for tourism since the tsnamui but who can blame them you kind of get followed on the beach by people offering massages.The beach is a good 5 min walk away and is full of locals bathing and socialising- it is a nice sight! They come over and chat frequently!The hotel rooms are lovely, large beds and nice clean bathrooms, equipped with air con and satilitte tv. The balcony's are small but have nice seats to relax in the calm area.The pool is very private with a sunken bar- not many sun loungers though. The restaurant was great the staff were very helpful and got you what ever you need.
Reviews.Author: sunshine85NorthWales

Reviews.Content: 鏈濋銇儠銉兗銉勩亴銈堛亱銇ｃ仧   showReview(19913007, 'full');
